Trigger You take fire damage.

Be they solar rays or blazing flames, light and heat are a part of you. For 1 minute, you glow from within, shedding bright light in a 30-foot radius (and dim light to the next 30 feet). While you glow in this way, your body is flush with warmthâ€”you treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less extreme (incredible cold becomes extreme, extreme cold becomes severe, and so on). You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against attacks, spells, and other effects that have the cold trait.
